mapper.insert: insert into food_logs (user_id, food_id, amount, kcal, eaten_date, meal_type) values (#{userId}, #{foodId}, #{amount}, #{kcal}, #{eatenDate}, #{mealType})
mapper.select:
SELECT food_logs.id, food_logs.user_id, food_logs.food_id, food_logs.amount, food_logs.kcal, food_logs.eaten_date, food_logs.meal_type,
foods.name, foods.food_group, foods.representative_food, foods.nutrient_reference_amount, foods.protein_g, foods.fat_g, foods.carbohydrate_g, foods.sugar_g, foods.fiber_g, foods.calcium_mg, foods.iron_mg, foods.phosphorus_mg, foods.potassium_mg, foods.sodium_mg, foods.vitamin_a_rae, foods.retinol_ug, foods.beta_carotene_ug, foods.thiamin_mg, foods.riboflavin_mg, foods.niacin_mg, foods.vitamin_c_mg, foods.vitamin_d_ug, foods.cholesterol_mg, foods.saturated_fat_g, foods.trans_fat_g FROM bodyguard.food_logs JOIN bodyguard.foods ON food_logs.food_id = foods.id where eaten_date = #{eatenDate}

SELECT food_logs.id, food_logs.user_id, food_logs.food_id, food_logs.amount, food_logs.kcal, food_logs.eaten_date, food_logs.meal_type,
foods.name, foods.food_group, foods.representative_food, foods.nutrient_reference_amount, foods.protein_g, foods.fat_g, foods.carbohydrate_g, foods.sugar_g, foods.fiber_g, foods.calcium_mg, foods.iron_mg, foods.phosphorus_mg, foods.potassium_mg, foods.sodium_mg, foods.vitamin_a_rae, foods.retinol_ug, foods.beta_carotene_ug, foods.thiamin_mg, foods.riboflavin_mg, foods.niacin_mg, foods.vitamin_c_mg, foods.vitamin_d_ug, foods.cholesterol_mg, foods.saturated_fat_g, foods.trans_fat_g FROM bodyguard.food_logs JOIN bodyguard.foods ON food_logs.food_id = foods.id where eaten_date = #{eatenDate} and user_id = #{userId}
